channel.title: 667/728 Dragonbone Problem :/
channel.description:
im currently adding in my own dragonbone code, everything looks perfect. and for some reason only the dragonplatelegs(or the last code for dragonbone) happens to work. this is what my code looks like
//Added by Xplode DragonBone_Mage_Gloves(24352, 6922, 24357, Skills.SMITHING, 75, 10, Skills.CRAFTING, 75, 10), DragonBone_Plateskirt(24352, 4585, 24364, Skills.SMITHING, 75, 10, Skills.CRAFTING, 75, 10), DragonBone_Platebody(24352, 14479, 24360, Skills.SMITHING, 75, 10, Skills.CRAFTING, 75, 10), DragonBone_Full_Helm(24352, 11335, 24359, Skills.SMITHING, 75, 10, Skills.CRAFTING, 75, 10), DragonBone_Boots(24352, 11732, 24362, Skills.SMITHING, 75, 10, Skills.CRAFTING, 75, 10), DragonBone_Gloves(24352, 13006, 24361, Skills.SMITHING, 75, 10, Skills.CRAFTING, 75, 10), DragonBone_Mage_Top(24352, 6916, 24355, Skills.SMITHING, 75, 10, Skills.CRAFTING, 75, 10), DragonBone_Mage_Hat(24352, 6918, 24354, Skills.SMITHING, 75, 10, Skills.CRAFTING, 75, 10), DragonBone_Mage_Bottoms(24352, 6924, 24356, Skills.SMITHING, 75, 10, Skills.CRAFTING, 75, 10), DragonBone_Mage_Boots(24352, 6920, 24358, Skills.SMITHING, 75, 10, Skills.CRAFTING, 75, 10), DragonBone_Platelegs(24352, 4087, 24363, Skills.SMITHING, 75, 10, Skills.CRAFTING, 75, 10),
